description: Play on words with temperature and angles
title: Hot Corner
n_1: Tim and Sara are setting up a new office space.
c2_1: Really? Let me check the thermostat.
n_2: Sara walks over to the corner Tim is pointing at.
c1_2: No need, I can tell you why it's hot.
n_3: Tim grins, ready with his punchline.
c2_3: Tim, that's not how temperature works!
n_4: They both chuckle at the pun.
c1_4: I guess I’m just a hot commodity around here.
c2_4: Stick to your day job, comedian!
